entry.tran: 雾号，雾角(用于雾天警示水中船只)
entry.def: A foghorn is a piece of equipment that makes a loud noise and is used to warn ships about the position of land and other ships in fog.

means.word_mean: 1. a loud low warning signal that can be heard by fog-bound ships
2. a warning device consisting of a horn that generates a loud low tone
